de.javakaffee.web.msm
Class TranscoderService

java.lang.Object
  de.javakaffee.web.msm.TranscoderService

public class TranscoderService
extends java.lang.Object

This service is responsible for serializing/deserializing session data so that this can be stored in / loaded from memcached.

          Creates a new TranscoderService.

TranscoderService

public TranscoderService(SessionAttributesTranscoder attributesTranscoder)

Method Detail

serialize

public byte[] serialize(MemcachedBackupSession session)
Serialize the given session to a byte array. This is a shortcut for 
 final byte[] attributesData = serializeAttributes( session, session.getAttributes() );
 serialize( session, attributesData );
The returned byte array can be deserialized using deserialize(byte[], Realm, Manager).

Parameters:
session - the session to serialize.
Returns:
the serialized session data.
See Also:
serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession, Map), serialize(MemcachedBackupSession, byte[]), deserialize(byte[], Realm, Manager)

deserialize

public MemcachedBackupSession deserialize(byte[] data,
                                          org.apache.catalina.Realm realm,
                                          org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
Deserialize session data that was serialized using serialize(MemcachedBackupSession) (or a combination of serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession, Map) and serialize(MemcachedBackupSession, byte[])).

Note: the returned session already has the manager set and MemcachedBackupSession.doAfterDeserialization() is invoked. Additionally the attributes hash is set (via MemcachedBackupSession.setDataHashCode(int)).

Parameters:
data - the byte array of the serialized session and its session attributes. Can be null.
realm - the realm that is used to reconstruct the principal if there was any stored in the session.
manager - the manager to set on the deserialized session.
Returns:
the deserialized MemcachedBackupSession or null if the provided byte[] data was null.

serializeAttributes

public byte[] serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession session,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes)
Serialize the given session attributes to a byte array, this is delegated to SessionAttributesTranscoder.serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession, Map) (using the SessionAttributesTranscoder provided in the constructor of this class).

Parameters:
session - the session that owns the given attributes.
attributes - the attributes to serialize.
Returns:
a byte array representing the serialized attributes.
See Also:
SessionAttributesTranscoder.serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession, Map)

deserializeAttributes

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> deserializeAttributes(byte[] data)
Deserialize the given byte array to session attributes, this is delegated to SessionAttributesTranscoder.deserializeAttributes(byte[]) (using the SessionAttributesTranscoder provided in the constructor of this class).

Parameters:
data - the serialized attributes
Returns:
the deserialized attributes
See Also:
SessionAttributesTranscoder.deserializeAttributes(byte[])

serialize

public byte[] serialize(MemcachedBackupSession session,
                        byte[] attributesData)
Serialize session fields to a byte[] and create a byte[] containing both the serialized byte[] of the session fields and the provided byte[] of the serialized session attributes.

Parameters:
session - its fields will be serialized to a byte[]
attributesData - the serialized session attributes (e.g. from serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession, Map))
Returns:
a byte[] containing both the serialized session fields and the provided serialized session attributes

protected static int copy(byte[] src,
                          byte[] dest,
                          int destBeginIndex)
